title: Trainee/Assistant Manager
summary:
We are looking for a Trainee/Assistant Manager, who will be the life and soul of this vibrant venue.

Trainee/Assistant Manager will support the Venue Manager in the day-to-day running of the business and gain valuable experience in all aspects of the business.
